summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 3rd Avenue West (east side) from West Smith Street to West Etruria Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8432 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
